# NAWA programmes for foreigners – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/nawa-programmes-for-foreigners/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:24:11

Welcome Point
 > 
NAWA & Welcome to Poland
 > 
NAWA programmes for foreigners

NAWA programmes for foreigners

Through developing the existing grant and aid programmes, NAWA aims at developing encouraging foreigners to start their studies in Poland at a number of fields to be conducted both in Polish and foreign languages.

The available programmes can be found at the links below: 

Scientists – NAWA

The Polish Language – NAWA
